alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 17 at 3:36AM PDT until April 19 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Areas of west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 55 mph possible in the western foothills. * WHERE...Western Antelope Valley Foothills and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 2 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Areas of blowing dust can suddenly and dangerously reduce visibilities to near zero.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
